mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ANSWER_NO), 0) +1 AS answerNo FROM TN_SMPLE_ANSWER WHERE REG_SN = #{paramMap.q_regSn}
INSERT INTO TN_SMPLE_ANSWER ( REG_SN, ANSWER_NO, ANS_DTL_CN, ANSWER_HIST, ANSWRR_ID, ANSWRR_NM, ANS_DT, IP_ADDR, PSWD, RGTR_NM, RGTR_ID, REG_DT, FILE_SN ) VALUES ( #{regSn}, #{answerNo}, #{ansDtlCn}, #{answerHist}, #{answrrId}, #{answrrNm}, SYSDATETIME, #{ipAddr}, #{pswd}, #{rgtrNm}, #{rgtrId}, SYSDATETIME, #{fileSn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TN_SMPLE_ANSWER SET ANS_DTL_CN=#{ansDtlCn}, ANSWER_HIST=#{answerHist}, ANSWRR_ID=#{answrrId}, ANSWRR_NM=#{answrrNm}, ANS_DT=#{ansDt}, IP_ADDR=#{ipAddr}, PSWD=#{pswd}, UPDUSR_NM=#{updusrNm}, MDFR_ID=#{mdfrId}, UPDT_DT=#{updtDt}, FILE_SN=#{fileSn} WHERE REG_SN = #{paramMap.q_regSn} AND ANSWER_NO = #{paramMap.q_answerNo}
